articles.description: Amoj Jacob, a prominent member of the men's 4x400-meter relay team, made a resounding statement after the World Athletics Championships after the team nearly dismantled USA's aura of invincibility. He went on to say that winning the Asiad gold won't be a hass…
articles.content: He eloquently shared his optimism for India's triumph in the upcoming Asian Games, emphasizing the nation's aspiration for gold. Furthermore, he highlighted that India's sights are set on securing a … [+3584 chars]

articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: US Open: Ukraine-born Maryna Zanevska explains reason behind snubbing handshake with Aryna Sabalenka - India Today
articles.description: Maryna Zanevska has explained the reason why she decided to snub the handshake with Aryna Sabalenka after their first round clash against on August 30. Sabalenka won the match 6-3, 6-2.
articles.content: On August 30th, 2023, the US Open witnessed a dramatic event as Maryna Zanevska, a Ukraine-born Belgian tennis player, played her last career match against Aryna Sabalenka, a Belarusian player. The m… [+2191 chars]

articles.author: ICC
articles.title: ECB announce equal match fee for England cricketers - ICC Cricket
articles.description: England joined India, New Zealand and South Africa in introducing pay parity for men's and women's teams in international cricket.
